code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant C as Cliente/Usuário
    participant API as NexoPark.API
    participant Core as NexoPark.Core (Services)
    participant Infra as NexoPark.Infra (Repository/DB)

    C->>API: POST /login (Credenciais)
    API->>Core: Validar Credenciais
    Core->>Infra: Buscar Administrador + Verificar Senha Hashed
    Infra-->>Core: Resultado da Busca
    alt Credenciais Válidas
        Core-->>API: Administrador Válido + Perfil (Role)
        API->>API: Gerar JWT
        API-->>C: Token JWT (Bearer)
        
        C->>API: GET /veiculos (Header: Authorization: Bearer <Token>)
        API->>API: Validar JWT + Autorização (Role)
        alt Autorizado
            API->>Core: Listar Veículos
            Core->>Infra: Buscar Veículos
            Infra-->>Core: Lista de Veículos
            Core-->>API: Lista de Veículos
            API-->>C: 200 OK + Lista
        else Não Autorizado
            API-->>C: 403 Forbidden
        end
    else Credenciais Inválidas
        API-->>C: 401 Unauthorized
    end

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是NexoPark.Core (Services)、NexoPark.Infra (Repository/DB)应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是NexoPark.Core (Services)、NexoPark.Infra (Repository/DB)应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含POST /login (Credenciais)这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 关于Validar Credenciais，你有什么想法？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Validar Credenciais就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含Buscar Administrador + Verificar Senha Hashed、Gerar JWT这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Buscar Administrador + Verificar Senha Hashed、Gerar JWT的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含GET /veiculos (Header: Authorization: Bearer <Token>)、Validar JWT + Autorização (Role)这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Listar Veículos、Buscar Veículos组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Listar Veículos、Buscar Veículos的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Listar Veículos、Buscar Veículos结束。
